content.c_answer2: The current cast of The Book of Mormon in the West End features Blair Gibson as Elder Price. Elder Cunningham is played by Conner Peirson. Other cast members include Paige P as Nabulungi, Colin Burnicle as Elder McKinley, Richard Lloyd King as Mafala Hatimbi, Ron Remke as Price's Dad/Joseph Smith/Mission President/Jesus, and Edward Baruwa as General/Satan.
content.name: Who stars in The Book of Mormon?
content.question: Who stars in The Book of Mormon?
